headline: Allegion PLC (ALLE) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Revenue Growth Amid International ...
summary: Allegion PLC (ALLE) reports a robust 5.4% revenue increase in Q4 2024, despite facing headwinds in its international segment.
